description: Try our easy to follow Pecorino & Herb Pesto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pesto,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Pecorino & Herb Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup firmly packed continental parsley leaves
0.5 cup extra virgin olive oil, plus extra

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor combine pecorino, pine nuts, parsley, rosemary, garlic and 1 tsp freshly ground black pepper. Process to a rough paste. Add oil and process until smooth. Transfer to a jar and cover in a thin layer of extra oil. Seal jar and refrigerate until ready to use.
